scripts.init-types: poetry run dipdup -c dipdup.local.yml -c dipdup.contract.yml -c dipdup.types.yml init -f
scripts.start: DEBUG_MODE=True poetry run dipdup -c dipdup.local.yml -c dipdup.contract.yml -c dipdup.yml run
scripts.wipe: DEBUG_MODE=True poetry run dipdup -c dipdup.local.yml -c dipdup.contract.yml -c dipdup.yml schema wipe --force
